org.endeavourhealth.informationmanager.common.transform

Class DOWLManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.FutureTask<V>
      • javafx.concurrent.Task
        • org.endeavourhealth.informationmanager.common.transform.DOWLManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture, javafx.concurrent.Worker, javafx.event.EventTarget, org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.ReasonerProgressMonitor

    public class DOWLManager
extends javafx.concurrent.Task
implements org.semanticweb.owlapi.reasoner.ReasonerProgressMonitor
    A manager class to handle ontologies and cross ontology activities

    includes conversion to and from OWL2 syntaxes

    includes load/generate/ transform /save ontology methods combining load/ save and conversion between Discovery JSON into OWL syntax or saves from OWL into Discovery

    Includes saving asserted ontology and generating inferred views via a reasoner

    Since:
    version 1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        gets a named index from a particular ontology from the list of ontologies loaded

        Example of index name would be "entity.name" for a list of

        if the index has not been generated all the indexes for that ontology are first generated

        Returns:
